column20: Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
column21: Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
column22: Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
column169: Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to opponents in front of you. The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.
column170: Hold: DMG and AoE will gradually increase.
column171: Elemental Absorption: If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/ Pyro/ Cryo/ Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
column270: Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.
column271: Elemental Absorption: If the tornado comes into contact with Hydro/ Pyro/ Cryo/ Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
column352: Slitting Wind: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.
column353: Second Wind: Palm Vortex kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.
column354: Raging Vortex: Palm Vortex pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.
column355: Uprising Whirlwind: Increases Energy Recharge by 16%.
column356: Sweeping Gust: Increases the Level of Gust Surge by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column357: Cherishing Breezes: Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm Vortex by 10%.
column358: Vortex Stellaris: Increases the Level of Palm Vortex by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column359: Intertwined Winds: Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
